Free play with another child blackboard which they have propped up

the children are jumping off a piece of furniture and trying to fly . Then they make themselves a slider' with the blackboard propped against the sofa

t is highly delighted with his accomplishment Indicating pottie
m returns Sound of running water

u.a: t tells S to put the winding key on the box
t holds the box and lau ghs at the sound of (laughs) mus ic

u.a: the two children are eating crisps

The children are playing with a rocking horse. they are jumping off its back

u.a: s slaps T T does't seem to mind too much

CHAT.comment: Watching TV They are completely engrossed
Both children still (no speech) watching the childrens' S: Fly S: Fly S: Fly (copying man on TV) program

u.a: t goes out to M in the kitchen she picks him up and he stops crying . Then sofa and he goes off to sleep again

T and S still watching (no speech) childrens' program , T is now fully awake
Still childrens' TV. T and S are watching the screen M is ironing

s starts telling F about the childrens' programs she has watched . F is washing

CHAT.comment: Tea is finished , the family is still sitting at the table and M is reading the story of Three Little Pigs'. When the wolf knocks on the door the children knock on the table will not let you come in Then I'll huff then I'll puff then I'll blow your houses' said the wolf.
